metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9501 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
In ImageMagick 7.0.5-7 Q16, an assertion failure was found in the functionLockSemaphoreInfo, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service viaa crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9501` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.8
imagemagick-common - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.8
libmagick++5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.8
libmagickcore5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.8
libmagickcore5-extra - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.8
libmagickwand5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.8
perlmagick - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.8').
